title: Need Font for a Pageant
content:
Hi!

I am trying to find a good font for a logo for a beauty/talent show pageant. I was wondering if anyone has any font suggestions... I would like a font that has some flourishes about it but not overly scripty.

Thanks!!

 [‹ BORATs new movie](http://web.archive.org/web/20080618160644/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36812 "Go to previous forum topic") [Semi-Slab ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080618160644/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36947 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tannenhauser

comments.content:
Bellevue is maybe something you might want to check. Boulevard too.  
Hope those can help.
